metadata.synopsis: A CIA free-lancer (Shô Kosugi) takes his children and a baby sitter (Doran Clark) to Malta, where he meets his KGB match (Jean-Claude Van Damme).

reviews: Black Eagle offers literally nothing new to the espionage or action genres except for its fresh young heavy. It's remarkable as a time capsule and little else.
With one chase, one aborted fight and one small fight on a boat in the first 55 minutes, Black Eagle isn't exactly an action movie
